text: Hedwig (or Advisa) of France (c. 1003â€“1063) was a French princess, the daughter of Robert II of France and Constance of Arles. She married Renauld I, Count of Nevers, on 25 January 1016, and they had the following children: * William I of Nevers (c. 1030-1083/1097) * Henry of Nevers (died 1067) * Guy (died 1067) * Robert, Baron of Craon (c. 1035-1098) * Adelaide Category:French princesses Category:1003 births Category:1060s deaths
title: Hedwig of France, Countess of Nevers
